headline: Is Direct FICO Distribution and VantageScore Price Cuts Shifting Competitive Dynamics for TransUnion (TRU)?
summary: Last week, FICO enabled tri-merge resellers to license its credit reports directly, bypassing Equifax, Experian, and TransUnion, while Equifax countered by reducing VantageScore 4.0 prices to US$4.95 per report through 2027 and offering free reports to mortgage lenders purchasing FICO scores after the Federal Housing Finance Agency approved VantageScore 4.0 for mortgage use. This shift increases competition and could pressure TransUnion’s pricing power, as regulatory changes create a more...
